About Us

OUR COMMUNITY

ABUNDANT LIVING

Here at Nexter, we know we’ve created something pretty special—but then again, we had a lot of special to work with. Winding alongside a collection of grand, spacious homes are majestic cedars, pines, and cypress trees. Outside your artfully designed window, songbirds share their music as wildflowers bloom in symphony. And brimming within the calmness of our lakes is the potential for splashing, laughter, and friendly competition.

OUR LOCATION

Nexter is located off FM 2978 in Magnolia, Texas, in southern Montgomery County. Our convenient location is minutes from The Woodlands, the newest 385-acre ExxonMobil Campus, Baker Hughes Campus, the new Tomball Business and Technology Park, and major transportation corridors including the Grand Parkway.

OUR AMENITIES

7.5 ACRES OF FUN!

With resort-style amenities, including a 9,400-sq.-ft. clubhouse that has a 24-hour fitness center, resort-style pool, children’s play areas, dog park, and more – you’ll find that Nexter is the perfect place to call home.
